code: import axios from'axios';var timeout=5000;export default{getAllProblems:function getAllProblems(){var allProblemsUrl="/api/problems";return axios.get(allProblemsUrl,{timeout:timeout});},createNewProblem:function createNewProblem(description,author){var createProblemsUrl="/api/problems";return axios.post(createProblemsUrl,{author:author,description:description});}};
